snippet: A prosecutor said the officers could have backed away from a confrontation with a homeless man, but the defense said they were just doing their jobs....
abstract: Lawyers in trial of former Albuquerque police officers Keith Sandy and Dominique Perez, who are charged in fatal 2014 shooting of homeless man James Boyd, offer different views of how shooting unfolded.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor said the officers could have backed away from a confrontation with a homeless man, but the defense said they were just doing their jobs.

headline.main: Trial of Ex-Officers Opens With 2 Views of Fatal Albuquerque Shooting
headline.print_headline: Albuquerque Trial Opens With 2 Views of Ex-Officers
